column2: ENGLISH
Open Employment Decisions
Open the employment decisions, which allow you to hire courtiers with specific skills.
Close Employment Decisions
Close the employment decisions.
Open Marriage Decisions
Open the arranged marriage decisions, which will allow you to arrange marriages for your courtiers.
Close Marriage Decisions
Close the arranged marriage decisions.
Open Spell Decisions
Open the spell decisions, which allow you or your sorcerer to cast various spells.
Close Spell Decisions
Close the spell decisions.
Open Prisoner Decisions
Open the prisoner decisions, which allow you to torture or punish your prisoners.
Close Prisoner Decisions
Close the prisoner decisions.
Open Edict Decisions
Open the edict decisions, which allow you to pass new crown laws more than once per lifetime.
Close Edict Decisions
Close the edict decisions.
Use Purple Living Bone and Conynhaela
I can use these herb together to cure my injuries.
Take a Loan
I can request a loan from the bank, the term to repay the loan is 10 years with 20 percent interest. The size of the loan can be up to 300¤.
Bank is already deliberating the size of loan
Have unsettled debt with bank
The bank will decide the size of loan.
Repay an old loan
I can repay an old unsettled loan of 100¤.
Repay an old loan
I can repay an old unsettled loan of 200¤.
Repay an old loan
I can repay an old unsettled loan of 300¤.
Make Wyzima Capital
The city of Wyzima has seen better days, but no one can deny its symbolic power. If you so wish, you may restore it as the capital of the Kingdom.
Wyzima once more becomes the seat of your power.
Make Tretogor Capital
The city of Tretogor has seen better days, but no one can deny its symbolic power. If you so wish, you may restore it as the capital of the Kingdom.
Tretogor once more becomes the seat of your power.
Make Nilfgaard Capital
The city of Nilfgaard has seen better days, but no one can deny its symbolic power. If you so wish, you may restore it as the capital of the Empire.
Nilfgaard once more becomes the seat of your power.
Convert to Dana Meadbh Religion
The elves have always had their own distinct beliefs and rituals that I have strayed from, it's time to embrace them once more.
Convert to Aen Seidhe Culture
The elves have always had their own distinct culture and traditions that I have strayed from, it's time to embrace them once more.
Convert to Dwarven Religion
The dwarves have always had their own distinct beliefs and rituals that I have strayed from, it's time to embrace them once more.
Convert to Dwarven Culture
The dwarves have always had their own distinct culture and traditions that I have strayed from, it's time to embrace them once more.
Convert to Halflings Religion
The halflings have always had their own distinct beliefs and rituals that I have strayed from, it's time to embrace them once more.
Convert to Halfling Culture
The halflings have always had their own distinct culture and traditions that I have strayed from, it's time to embrace them once more.
Convert to Gnomish Religion
The gnomes have always had their own distinct beliefs and rituals that I have strayed from, it's time to embrace them once more.
Convert to Gnomish Culture
The gnomes have always had their own distinct culture and traditions that I have strayed from, it's time to embrace them once more.
Convert to Nature Religion
The dryads have always had their own distinct beliefs and rituals that I have strayed from, it's time to embrace them once more.
Convert to Dryad Culture
The dryads have always had their own distinct culture and traditions that I have strayed from, it's time to embrace them once more.
Increase Crown Obligation
You can issue an edict to increase the Crown Obligation law.
Decrease Crown Obligation
You can issue an edict to decrease the Crown Obligation law.
Increase Crown Levy
You can issue an edict increase the Crown Levy law.
Decrease Crown Levy
You can issue an edict decrease the Crown Levy law.
Increase Tolerance
You can issue an edict to increase the Tolerance law.
Decrease Tolerance
You can issue an edict to decrease the Tolerance law.
Increase Imperial Authority
You can issue an edict to increase the Imperial Authority.
Invite Priestess to Court
Scour the land for a priestess to join my court and advise me on religious matters.
Invite Soldier to Court
Invite a promising soldier to court, to aid with military matters.
Invite Spy to Court
Invite a promising spy to court, to aid with matters of intrigue.
Invite Diplomat to Court
Invite a promising diplomat to court, to aid with diplomatic matters.
Invite Witcher to Court
Spread the word that you are looking for a witcher to employ.
Already invited a witcher
Invite Sorcerer to Court
Invite a learned sorcerer from one of the magic academies.
Demand Lower Crown Levy
Present an ultimatum to §Y[Root.Liege.GetBestName]§!, demanding lower Crown Levy. If [Root.Liege.GetSubjectPronoun] refuses to comply, your Faction will rise in revolt.
Demand Lower Crown Obligation
Present an ultimatum to §Y[Root.Liege.GetBestName]§!, demanding lower Crown Obligation. If [Root.Liege.GetSubjectPronoun] refuses to comply, your Faction will rise in revolt.
Demand Lower Tolerance
Present an ultimatum to §Y[Root.Liege.GetBestName]§!, demanding lower Tolerance. If [Root.Liege.GetSubjectPronoun] refuses to comply, your Faction will rise in revolt.
Demand Higher Tolerance
Present an ultimatum to §Y[Root.Liege.GetBestName]§!, demanding higher Tolerance. If [Root.Liege.GetSubjectPronoun] refuses to comply, your Faction will rise in revolt.
Demand Succession by Tanistry
Present an ultimatum to §Y[Root.Liege.GetBestName]§!, demanding succession by Tanistry. If [Root.Liege.GetSubjectPronoun] refuses to comply, your Faction will rise in revolt.
Demand Succession by Ultimogeniture
Present an ultimatum to §Y[Root.Liege.GetBestName]§!, demanding succession by Ultimogeniture. If [Root.Liege.GetSubjectPronoun] refuses to comply, your Faction will rise in revolt.
Vassalize the Order of the Flaming Rose
As a ruler who have given a castle to the Order of the Flaming Rose, it is within my power to vassalize the Order at the cost of 500 gold.
Expel the Order of the Flaming Rose
I can drive the Order of the Flaming Rose from my realm and seize their castles. However, it is a very impious thing to do...
Donate 300¤ to the Order of the Flaming Rose
I can donate money to the Order of the Flaming Rose in exchange for Piety.
Send [Root.GetFirstName] to Aretuza Academy
Send §Y[Root.GetFirstName]§! to Aretuza Academy to learn to control [Root.GetHerHis] magic talent.
Send [Root.GetFirstName] to Ban Ard Academy
Send §Y[Root.GetFirstName]§! to Ban Ard Academy to learn to control [Root.GetHerHis] magic talent.
Arrange Courtier Marriages
Arrange marriages for your human courtiers, marrying them to each other where possible. Will not affect courtiers of your dynasty.
Arrange Courtier Marriages
Arrange marriages for your dwarven courtiers, marrying them to each other where possible. Will not affect courtiers of your dynasty.
Arrange Courtier Marriages
Arrange marriages for your elven courtiers, marrying them to each other where possible. Will not affect courtiers of your dynasty.
Arrange Marriage for [Root.GetTitledFirstName]
Arrange a marriage for [Root.GetTitledFirstName]. This will create a random human character of approximately the same age as [Root.GetObjectPronoun], with random traits and attributes.
Arrange Marriage for [Root.GetTitledFirstName]
Arrange a marriage for [Root.GetTitledFirstName]. This will create a random dwarf character of approximately the same age as [Root.GetObjectPronoun], with random traits and attributes.
Arrange Marriage for [Root.GetTitledFirstName]
Arrange a marriage for [Root.GetTitledFirstName]. This will create a random gnome character of approximately the same age as [Root.GetObjectPronoun], with random traits and attributes.
Arrange Marriage for [Root.GetTitledFirstName]
Arrange a marriage for [Root.GetTitledFirstName]. This will create a random gnome character of approximately the same age as [Root.GetObjectPronoun], with random traits and attributes.
Hold a Feast
Hold the biggest feast ever seen in the Kingdom!
Hold a Velen
Hold a feast to celebrate the eight savaed of the year - autumn harvest!
The preparations for this year's Velen celebration begin.
Hold a Birke
Hold a feast to celebrate the fourth savaed of the year - spring harvest!
The preparations for this year's Birke celebration begin.
Release Prisoners
Your dungeons are full to brim with prisoners, even the wardens have been complaining that they don't now what to do with them. I could release some of them from the dungeon for free.
Execute Prisoners
Your dungeons are full to brim with prisoners, even the wardens have been complaining that they don't now what to do with them. I could execute some of the prisoners.
Appoint Commander of Special Forces
You can appoint a Commander of Special Forces, an agent to deal with things you don't wish to dirty your hands with personally, mainly that includes Scoia'tael scum.
Go on a Pilgrimage

Some faithful followers of [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] choose to make a pilgrimage at some point in their lives. The devout pilgrim is prepared to travel long distances in order to visit the holy place of the faith.
Unite the North
The ever-existing threat from South can only be stopped by unifying the North under one crown. You need §Ythree§! of the major Northern kingdoms to do that.
Create Dwarf Empire
Create a new land for dwarves equal to ancient dwarven kingdoms before the humans appeared.
Create Hen Caerme
Create a new land for elves equal to elven kingdoms of legends before the humans appeared.
Find Black Hammers
Creating an empire isn't enough to re-establish dwarven dominance over these lands, dedicated military force is required to finally push the humans out of our ancestral lands.
Find Order of Saethyddion
Creating an empire isn't enough to re-establish elven dominance over these lands, dedicated military force is required to finally push the humans out of our ancestral lands.
Make Drakenborg into Prison

Drakenborg is on of the most well defended castles of Redania, it would be perfect place to imprison enemies, traitors and all other who you can't risk escaping or don't want to see ever again, but can't execute outright.
Appoint the first commander of Drakenborg
Hold Archery Competition
Let us hold an archery competition the like of which is only rumored. We will never hold another one in our reign.
Embrace Solarist School of Thought
Solar religion have two deities - Emperor and Sun, often they are seen as one and same. But Solarist school of thought places Sun above Emperor.
You embrace the Solarist school of thought
Embrace Imperialist School of Thought
Solar religion have two deities - Emperor and Sun, often they are seen as one and same. But Imperialist school of thought places Emperor above Sun.
You embrace the Imperialist school of thought
Restore the Hierarchy in Wieczny Ognia
The Hierarch has lost control of his secular domain, but it is within my power to restore the City of Eternal Fire to him!
Cast Charm (Court Mage)
Charm the target with a magic spell. Improves the opinion of the target, who will always accept diplomatic interactions and not take any hostile actions.
Cast Charm
Charm the target with a magic spell. Improves the opinion of the target, who will always accept diplomatic interactions and not take any hostile actions.
§Y[Root.GetBestName]§! will have a better opinion of you for a time.
Cast Heal (Court Mage)
Heal can immediately close open wounds, mend broken bones and cure any illnesses.
Cast Heal (Court Mage)
Heal can immediately close open wounds, mend broken bones and cure any illnesses.
Cast Heal
Heal can immediately close open wounds, mend broken bones and cure any illnesses.
Cast Heal
Heal can immediately close open wounds, mend broken bones and cure any illnesses.
§Y[Root.GetBestName]§! will lose any bad health traits, except '§YStressed§!' and '§YDepressed§!'
Cast Glamour
With Glamour you can make yourself attractive by hiding the age and any bodily defects under a veil of magic.
§Y[Root.GetBestName]§! will gain the trait '§YAttractive§!' and will lose all bad congenital traits
Have Court Mage Cast Foresight
There are many dangers lurking around that could be easily avoided if you just knew about them. Foresight is the spell for just such cases.
Cast Foresight
There are many dangers lurking around that could be easily avoided if you just knew about them. Foresight is the spell for just such cases.
All plots against §Y[Root.GetBestName]§! will be revealed
Cast Protection (Court Mage)
Protection can save someone from untimely demise by hand of assassin or accident, although it can't stop natural death.
Cast Protection
Protection can save someone from untimely demise by hand of assassin or accident, although it can't stop natural death.
Cast Protection (Court Mage)
Protection can save someone from untimely demise by hand of assassin or accident, although it can't stop natural death.
Cast Protection
Protection can save someone from untimely demise by hand of assassin or accident, although it can't stop natural death.
§Y[Root.GetBestName]§! will be able to avoid death by unnatural cause once.
Have Court Mage Assist Siege
Siege is a long and tiring thing, but with support of magic you can speed it up considerably.
Assist Siege with Magic
Siege is a long and tiring thing, but with support of magic you can speed it up considerably.
Enemy will lose some troops and morale
Have Court Mage Assist Battle
Battles can be easily turned in your favour with a bit of magic support.
Assist Battle with Magic
Battles can be easily turned in your favour with a bit of magic support.
Enemy will lose some troops and morale
Force [Root.GetTitledFirstName] to relinquish claims
As [Root.GetSheHe] is your prisoner and a claimant to your rightful titles, you may force [Root.GetHerHim] to relinquish said claims, with torture if necessary.
Visit [Root.GetTitledFirstName]
As [Root.GetTitledFirstName] is your prisoner, you can visit [Root.GetHerHim] to spend a night with [Root.GetHerHim]. It's not like [Root.GetSheHe] can resist.
Visit [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s cell
Confiscate [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s Artifacts
As [Root.GetTitledFirstName] is your prisoner, you can confiscate artifacts owned by [Root.GetBestName].
Give Tower to Mage
Give an unoccupied mage tower to a sorcerer at court.
Give Tower to Mage
Give an unoccupied mage tower to a sorcerer at court.
